name: Interstellar fishing
description:
Game for Easy Jam (8 Bits to Infinity) .
The basic idea is to go fishing in diferent planets of the universe to catch fish, then you can put them in your aquarium the watch them and show how good you are at fishing!

Basic controls:
Movement: WASD
Actions: Left click
Enter the aquarium view: Enter key
Exit the aquarium: Escape key
